app.name: SAAS Manager Panel
app.description: Manage tenants and monitor system health

login.title: SAAS Manager Login
login.subtitle: Sign in to manage your tenants
login.formDescription: Enter your email and password to access the SAAS Manager Panel

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.loginFailed: Invalid email or password. Please try again.

auth.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please login again.

support.title: Need Help?
support.description: Contact our support team for assistance

tenants.title: Tenants
tenants.subtitle: Manage all clinic tenants in the system
tenants.tableDescription: List of all tenants with their details

empty.title: No tenants found
empty.description: Get started by creating your first tenant

tenants.name: Name
tenants.noTenantsDescription: Get started by creating your first tenant

form.slugHelp: Unique identifier for the tenant (lowercase, alphanumeric, hyphens only)
form.slugMinLength: Slug must be at least 3 characters
form.slugMaxLength: Slug must be less than 50 characters
form.slugInvalid: Slug can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens
form.slugNoHyphenStart: Slug cannot start or end with a hyphen
form.name: Tenant Name
form.nameHelp: Display name for the clinic or organization
form.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
form.nameMaxLength: Name must be less than 100 characters
form.adminEmailDescription: The admin account will be created with email: {email}
form.setupDescription: Set up a new clinic tenant with initial configuration

success.credentialsDescription: These credentials will only be displayed once. Make sure to save them securely before closing this dialog.

branding.title: Branding Configuration
branding.description: Customize the visual appearance for this tenant
branding.invalidColor: Invalid color format. Please use hexadecimal format (e.g., #3B82F6)

delete.title: Delete Tenant
delete.description: This action will mark the tenant as deleted and archive their data. All tenant users will lose access to their system.
delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this tenant?

auditLogs.title: Audit Logs
auditLogs.description: View all administrative actions and system events
auditLogs.exportSuccessDescription: Audit logs have been exported successfully
auditLogs.noLogsDescription: No logs match your current filters

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.tenantCreatedMessage: New tenant '{name}' has been created successfully
notifications.authenticationFailures: Multiple authentication failures detected for tenant '{name}'

errors.unexpectedErrorMessage: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
errors.networkError: Network connection error. Please check your internet connection.
errors.badRequest: Invalid request. Please check your input and try again.
errors.unauthorized: Your session has expired. Please login again.
errors.forbidden: You don't have permission to perform this action.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.conflict: A conflict occurred. The resource may have been modified.
errors.validationError: Please check your input and try again.
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
errors.serverError: A server error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.badGateway: Service temporarily unavailable. Please try again.
errors.serviceUnavailable: Service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
errors.unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
errors.connectionLostMessage: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your connection.

sessionTimeout.title: Session Timeout Warning
sessionTimeout.message: Your session will expire in 2 minutes due to inactivity.
sessionTimeout.warning: Click 'Extend Session' to continue working, or you will be automatically logged out.

security.rateLimitExceeded: Too many requests. Please slow down and try again.
security.sessionExpired: Your session has expired due to inactivity

billing.title: Billing
billing.manageSubscription: Manage subscription plan and billing details
billing.cancelSubscriptionDescription: Stop recurring billing either immediately or at the end of the current period.
billing.cancellationReasonHelp: Explain why you are canceling. This will be stored in the audit log.
billing.resumeDescription: Reactivate billing access for this tenant.
billing.pendingCancellationNotice: Cancellation scheduled for {date}. Renew to keep the subscription active.
billing.overrideDescription: Manually change the subscription plan for this tenant. This action will be logged for audit purposes.
billing.reasonPlaceholder: Explain why you're overriding the plan (e.g., special agreement, support case, etc.)
billing.reasonHint: This reason will be recorded in the audit log. Minimum 10 characters required.
billing.overrideWarning: This will immediately change the tenant's plan tier. This action is logged and cannot be undone.
billing.reasonTooShortError: Reason must be at least 10 characters
billing.samePlanError: Selected plan is the same as current plan
billing.noAuditLogs: No audit logs found for this tenant

paypal.title: PayPal Configuration
paypal.subtitle: Configure PayPal subscription billing settings
paypal.clientIdHelp: Your PayPal REST API Client ID from the PayPal Developer Dashboard
paypal.clientSecretHelp: Your PayPal REST API Client Secret (leave empty to keep existing)
paypal.planIdHelp: The subscription plan ID created in your PayPal account
paypal.planMappingsDescription: Add PayPal plan IDs for each tier and billing cycle you offer.
paypal.planDescriptionPlaceholder: Short summary shown on pricing cards
paypal.featuresPlaceholder: One per line, or comma separated
paypal.featuresHint: These sync to the landing page and upgrade modals.
paypal.planConfigValidationError: Please provide at least one plan mapping with a tier and plan ID.
paypal.webhookIdHelp: Optional: The webhook ID for receiving PayPal events
paypal.saveSuccessDescription: PayPal configuration has been updated successfully
paypal.info1: Credentials are validated before saving to ensure they work correctly
paypal.info2: Client secret is encrypted and stored securely in the database
paypal.info3: Toggle sandbox mode to switch between testing and production environments
